resources.string: Enter a QR code above and hit Save to store it. To use it, add the app under the Watch Apps menu in MetaWatch Community Edition or Noah Edition’s Preferences.

For examples of some things you can encode in QR codes that common scanners will recognize, see the ZXing wiki. This will scale best with Version 2 QR codes. V1 codes can be hard to scan due to the lack of an alignment pattern, and due to the watch’s low-resolution display you may have a hard time scanning V3 or higher codes. Version 2 QR codes can hold 39-74 numeric characters, 24-45 alphanumeric (0–9, A–Z upper-case only, space, $, %, *, +, -, ., /, :) or 17-31 characters if you use any other letters or symbols.
Enter text to encode as QR.
